name: Blazing Speed
description:
Blazing Speed

Racer is the dark horse, just entering the street racing circuit and wants to make a name for themselves by having the most blazing speed. Only Racer is met with rigid competition and must defeat all opponents to claim the title as the one with the most Blazing Speed. So will you rise to the challenge?

Controls

Forward: W

Backwards: S

Left: A

Right: D

Features

  • Realistic car controller with steering, breaking, acceleration, etc.
  • Highly detailed map with road markers, terrain, and skybox
  • Competitive AI 
  • Informational HUD including Lap counter and timer
